程序包 src.main.java.AI_story11_21_22

类 Transaction

java.lang.Object
src.main.java.AI_story11_21_22.Transaction
public class Transaction extends Object
Title : Transaction.java Description: This class models a transaction with attributes such as ID, description, price, classification, date, and input/output type.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Transaction

      public Transaction()
      Default constructor for creating a Transaction object from a CSV file.

    • Transaction

      public Transaction(String id, String description, double price, String classification, String date, String ioType)
      Constructs a new Transaction object with the given attributes.
      参数:
      id - the ID of the transaction
      description - the description or summary of the transaction
      price - the price or amount of the transaction
      classification - the classification of the transaction
      date - the date of the transaction
      ioType - the input/output type of the transaction
